name: amazon
title: Software Dev Engineer
description: Developed services in Java to extract categories, devices, features, and actions from a Large Language Model (LLM)
The LLM generates requests in the form of GET or POST. For example, switch on the light would be a POST request, while get the brightness of the light would be a GET request.
Our team verifies whether the user is configured to interact with a specific device and whether the requested feature and action are enabled.
If the request is valid, it is forwarded downstream to execute the action; otherwise, it is sent back to the LLM with a nicely written statements to customers.

Utilized Java and built a CDK pipeline to monitor failures, with a dashboard for visibility. High-severity failures trigger alarms. We also tracked metrics for each request to identify and rectify issues.
This pipeline ensures that a Pull Request (PR) is raised only after all unit tests, functional tests, and execution sequences pass successfully.
Our team conducts code reviews where everyone is involved to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the end-to-end flow of our services.

name: bofa
title: Software Engineer, Hadoop Developer
description: Designed, developed and modified rich UI of 12+ custom components utilizing React JS, HTML/SCSS , React Redux, React Thunks.
Developed and maintained 30+ REST APIs writing documentation using openAPI specification and Postman app to verify while developing.
Used 11+ node package manager for backend development such as Express, mongoose, mongo.js, body-parser, brcypt.js and validation.
Analyzed project flow, data usage, and work processes, examine 100% of problem areas and fixed bugs.
Executed & written 200+ unit tests, test Driven Deployments (TDD) to ensure 100% of code with SDLC was without bugs.
Planned, tracked and managed deliverables on 50+ short-term long-term sprints and deployments.
Suggested 5+ improvements to product design, functionally and optimize code by 10% as informed by client's request.
Development of company´s internal CI system, providing a comprehensive API for CI/CD.
